title: Did Louis donate $25 million to minority-owned businesses, while the founder of the Home Warehouse gave Trump?
subtitle: Special compares the political participation of home improvement chains neglecting some context.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Lou was giving $25 million as a grant to minority-owned businesses that reopen in the midst of the COVID-19 epidemic, while the founder of Home Depot gave millions to US President Donald Trump's campaign.
